Resources

Course Materials

The most current version of Smith’s Tonal Models of Music is always available at this Dropbox link.

In addition, my in-development, open-source, and open-access textbook Open Music Theory will be a helpful resource—in particular, the resources listed under “Fundamentals”.

Your Current Grade

You can find your current grade by visiting tinyurl.com/your-UB-ID-number, where “your-UB-ID-number” is the 8-digit number assigned to you by UB.
